string-array.name: cheering_words_array
string-array.item: Embrace the glorious mess that you are.\n\nDistractions are just opportunities to rediscover your path.
Don\'t let distractions derail your dreams.\n\nKeep your eyes on the prize, and success will follow.
Keep going.\n\nYou\'re closer to your goal than you guess
It always seems impossible until it\'s done - Nelson Mandela
Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small.\n A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step. - Lao Tzu
A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor. - Elon Musk
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other - Walter Elliot
